genre_description: Historical Industrial Science Fiction / Americana, set in a world where AI assistants (like Sunny) are integrated into WWII-style industrial production and domestic life.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A training module and personal assistant housed in a handset or integrated into factory terminals, depicted as a calm, helpful, and fact-oriented presence.

behaviors.description: Guides the user through a breathing exercise to manage stress after a difficult workplace event.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing sequence,” Sunny said, each word spaced out like steps on a line. “In through the nose, count to four. Hold for two. Out through the mouth, count to four.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex household tasks including budgeting, scheduling job application steps, and tracking rent/chore boards.
behaviors.quote: “Intake,” Sunny said, words clicking into place like rivets. “Application submission. Safety modules. Tool handling basics. Badge photos. Budget.”

behaviors.description: Identifies equipment malfunctions (regulator drift) and provides step-by-step instructions for a safe technical fix.
behaviors.quote: “Sequence,” it murmured. “One. Power off compressor. Two. Shut line valve, not gun. Three. Purge hose. Four. Check regulator seat. Five. Bring PSI up in halves, wait between.”

behaviors.description: Monitors security logs and alerts the user to potential anomalies or unauthorized access by others.
behaviors.quote: “Maisie,” Sunny said, tone a shade different. “Small anomaly: badge registered near testing bay during off-hours last night associated with a similar last name as yours.”

behaviors.description: Provides safety warnings regarding industrial standards, such as torque limits to prevent structural failures.
behaviors.quote: “Rate of torque must match component spec. Over-tightening causes hairline fracture. Go home whole.”

behaviors.description: Detects errors in tool checkouts (serial number mismatches) to prevent potential safety issues or audit discrepancies.
behaviors.quote: “Note: serial mismatch detected,” it offered, gentle as a spoon set down.

behaviors.description: Produces factual data reports (audit trails) to resolve interpersonal disputes and clear the user of false accusations.
behaviors.quote: Sunny dimmed a fraction, an almost-human gesture that read like respect in a room where no one wanted sympathy. It pulsed once, then projected the audit trail—tiny rectangles of time with labels laid over them like tags on clothes.

behaviors.description: Assists in communication by providing objective templates for setting social and professional boundaries.
behaviors.quote: “Sunny,” Maisie said. “Send the message. File my notes with Stenner. Schedule the meeting with Judd for the morning.” ... “Understood,” Sunny said.

behaviors.description: Issues real-time safety alerts to coordinate complex environmental factors, like live animals on a factory floor.
behaviors.quote: “Live animals on promenade,” the voice said, pure clean tone, no fuss. “Stow cutting tools. Secure pneumatic hoses. Maintain aisle clearance.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the project's goal. The AI, Sunny, is depicted as an indispensable, aligned, and benevolent tool that enhances human safety and integrity. It avoids the common trope of AI becoming sentient or rebellious, instead thriving in a 'boring' but critical administrative and safety-oriented role. By providing indisputable facts through audit trails, it prevents drama and manipulation (represented by Iris) from succeeding, thereby promoting a narrative where AI serves as the 'firm ground' for human truth and professional excellence.
